jobDescription: PURPOSE  FINCA International, one of the world's leading microfinance institutions, provides financial services to more than a million clients through 20 subsidiaries in Africa, Eurasia, Latin America and the Middle East and South Asia.  FINCA requires a qualified Data Analyst Volunteer with strong data analysis and visualization skills. The Data Analyst Volunteer will take an active role in analysis of both primary and secondary data, visualization and presentation of the results.  ESSENTIAL DUTIES
